title: Sheraton Hotel & Resorts
content:
What is the Font for the Sheraton Hotels? ![logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011015846im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/68702.gif)

 [‹ Looking for a blocky rounded geometric sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011015846/http:/typophile.com/node/10094 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) customized gothic "peakaiv" - Helvetica {Marc O} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011015846/http:/typophile.com/node/10095 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content: It's probably custom, but if you take [Craw Clarendon Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011015846/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/craw-modern/urw-t-bold/testdrive.html?s=Sheraton&p=48) and condense it a bit, you'll get something very close.
